cast.overview: Set in Brazil, three kids who make a discovery in a garbage dump soon find themselves running from the cops and trying to right a terrible wrong.
cast.title: Trash

details.biography: Maria Tereza Ferreira Pereira (born July 20, 1952 in São Paulo) is a Brazilian actress and dancer. Known for her work in television and cinema in recent years, she began her career as a dancer in theater in the 1970s, where she established herself as an actress, especially in musical theater. Pereira has won several awards, including a Mambembe Trophy and an Aplauso Brasil Award, in addition to having been nominated for an APETESP Theater Award.
details.name: Teca Pereira
